body: Hi Mostapha, Chris, and everyone! I’m trying to use Honeybee for EP Analysis. I have set different situations for the shades for different time periods of the year.  I’m not able to get multiple results for them.  Is there any way I can modify the code to get multiple IDF files or better multiple result file in excel from the EP component?

replies.body:
Hi,



If you have different HBZones for your situations, You should plug them into _HBZones in Honeybee_Run Energy Simulation component and graft the _HBZones input.
If I understand your question correctly you need to set a different name for each analysis which will create different folders and different idf files.
